title: Supreme Court Opens Path to More Guns in Public in Big US Cities
itunes:title: Supreme Court Opens Path to More Guns in Public in Big US Cities
description:
Dr. Amesh Adalja, Senior Scholar for the Center for Health Security at the Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health, provides an update on Covid cases. Bloomberg News Legal Analyst June Grasso discusses the US Supreme Court striking down a New York law that required people to show a special need to carry a handgun in public. Bloomberg Businessweek Columnist Max Chafkin and Bloomberg News Markets Reporter Justina Lee share the details of the Businessweek Magazine cover story Crypto’s Richest Man Faces Regulatory Crackdown, Brutal Winter. Bloomberg News Projects & Investigations Reporter Lauren Etter covers the FDA to ordering Juul E-Cigarettes off the U.S. Market. And we Drive to the Close with Rebecca Corbin, CEO of Corbin Advisors.
Hosts: Tim Stenovec and Katie Greifeld. Producer: Paul Brennan. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
